locale.description: A list of locales that the slot type supports.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of slot types to return in the response. The default is 10.

nextToken.description: A pagination token that fetches the next page of slot types. If the response to this API call is truncated, Amazon Lex returns a pagination token in the response. To fetch the next page of slot types, specify the pagination token in the next request.

signatureContains.description: Substring to match in built-in slot type signatures. A slot type will be returned if any part of its signature matches the substring. For example, 'xyz' matches both 'xyzabc' and 'abcxyz.'
